quotes.title: Thanos
quotes.desc: The hardest choices require the strongest wills.

quotes.title: Joker
quotes.desc: In their last moments, people show you who they really are.

quotes.title: Henri Ducard
quotes.desc: You must become more than just a man in the mind of your opponent.

quotes.title: Erik Lehnsherr
quotes.desc: Peace was never an option.

quotes.title: Bane
quotes.desc: No one cared who I was until I put on the mask.

quotes.title: Erik Stevens
quotes.desc: Bury me in the ocean with my ancestors who jumped from ships, because they knew death was better than bondage.

quotes.title: Maul
quotes.desc: Unfortunately for you, history will not see it that way.

quotes.title: Norman Osborn
quotes.desc: Despite everything you've done for them, eventually they will hate you.

quotes.title: Quentin Beck
quotes.desc: People need to believe, and nowadays, they'll believe anything.

quotes.title: Kaecilius
quotes.desc: People think in terms of good and evil when really, time is the true enemy of us all.

quotes.title: Ultron
quotes.desc: Everyone creates the thing they dread.

quotes.title: Wenwu
quotes.desc: I have eaten more salt than you have had rice in your life.

quotes.title: Red Skull
quotes.desc: You pretend to be a simple soldier, but in reality, you are just afraid to admit that we have left humanity behind.

quotes.title: The Riddler
quotes.desc: If you are justice, please do not lie / What is the price for your blind eye?

quotes.title: Lockdown
quotes.desc: The trouble with loyalty to a cause is that the cause will always betray you.

quotes.title: Harvey Dent
quotes.desc: You either die a hero, or you live long enough to see yourself become the villain.

quotes.title: Ben Solo
quotes.desc: Let the past die. Kill it, if you have to.

quotes.title: Helmut Zemo
quotes.desc: The desire to become a superhuman cannot be separated from supremacist ideals.

quotes.title: Lex Luthor
quotes.desc: If God is all-powerful, he cannot be all good. And if he is all good, then he cannot be all-powerful.

quotes.title: Negan Smith
quotes.desc: If you don't protect what belongs to you, then sooner or later it belongs to someone else.

quotes.title: Wilson Fisk
quotes.desc: A woman that can be bought isn't worth having.

quotes.title: Petyr Baelish
quotes.desc: A man with no motive is a man no one suspects. Always keep your foes confused.

quotes.title: Hannibal Lecter
quotes.desc: Cruelty is a gift humanity has given itself.

quotes.title: Gustavo Fring
quotes.desc: A dog who bites every owner he's had can only be disciplined with a firm hand or put down.

quotes.title: Arthur Fleck
quotes.desc: The worse part of having a mental illness is people expect you to behave as if you don't.

quotes.title: Tyler Durden
quotes.desc: It's only after we've lost everything that we're free to do anything.

quotes.title: Frank Castle
quotes.desc: You know you're one bad day away from being me.

quotes.title: White Death
quotes.desc: If you do not control your fate, it will control you.

quotes.title: Syndrome
quotes.desc: When everyone's super, no one will be.

quotes.title: Ernesto de la Cruz
quotes.desc: You have to be willing to do whatever it takes to seize your moment.

quotes.title: Ivan Vanko
quotes.desc: If you can make God bleed, people will cease to believe in him.

quotes.title: Flint Marko
quotes.desc: I'm not a bad person. Just had bad luck.

quotes.title: Voldemort
quotes.desc: There is no good and evil. There is only power, and those too weak to seek it.

quotes.title: Otto Octavius
quotes.desc: Intelligence is not a privilege, it's a gift. And you use it for the good of mankind.

quotes.title: Adrian Toomes
quotes.desc: We build the roads and we fight all their wars and everything. They don't care about us.

quotes.title: Kenny Ackerman
quotes.desc: Everyone had to be drunk on something to keep pushing on. Everyone was a slave to something.

quotes.title: Eren Yeager
quotes.desc: You win, you live. You lose, you die. If you don't fight, you can't win.

quotes.title: Thrawn
quotes.desc: What was first just a dream has become a frightening reality for those who may oppose us.

quotes.title: Baylan Skoll
quotes.desc: It is an unfortunate evil, but speaks to a greater truth. One must destroy in order to create.
